channel.title: Computer help
channel.description:
Well recently, I downloaded a client, it had malicious Code in it and it wiped alot of my stuff, after Getting Most things back, i finally went to sleep 5:09am, I wake up at about 12 noon, and decide To go for a run i turn my computer On to check if my mates on msn, and WTF? My fire-wall and windows live One care is turned off, So i go to Turn my firewall on and i't just wont let me it's grayed out, and neither Will windows live one care work either So iv'e been trying to fix this forawhile now, Iv'e tried alot of certain ways, But if you have any suggestions / Ways To fix this PLEASE reply, Thanks - Sparkz :confused:
Picture: [img]http://img1.uploadhouse.com/fileuploads/2300/2300761a844b1c64c596f0bcd81b9a2b65649e1.jpg[/img]

item.title: Computer help
item.dc:creator: @Ckstunnerscape Ckstunner
item.description:
@Ckstunnerscape wrote:

dude here is what you do… make a new icon on the desktop

and add this for the target or directory or what ever %SystemRoot%\system32\restore\rstrui.exe
Or click my computer-windows-system32-Find the folder caled restore-click it and find a file called rstrui

Read full topic

item.title: Computer help
item.dc:creator: @sp4rkz sp4rkz
item.description:
@sp4rkz wrote:

ALREADY TRIED MAKING A NEW ACCOUNT, & IT DOESN’T HAVE ANY ACCESORIES, WHAT IF I DONE A SEARCH FOR SYSTEM RESTORE?

Read full topic

item.title: Computer help
item.dc:creator: @Ckstunnerscape Ckstunner
item.description:
@Ckstunnerscape wrote:

Try making a new user account and try system restore, but you need to be an administrator to do system restore

Read full topic

item.title: Computer help
item.dc:creator: @codeusa codeusa
item.description:
@codeusa wrote:

Your going to have to dump your hardrive if you don’t have, system restore.

Read full topic

item.title: Computer help

item.description:

item.title: Computer help
item.dc:creator: @Ckstunnerscape Ckstunner
item.description:
@Ckstunnerscape wrote:

start - all programs - accesories - system tools - system restore, restor to the point before you downloaded client, and pleasse let us know which one so we dont download it

Read full topic
